long_description: Bright, waterproof and easy to install, the Knog Blinder 4 rear bike light offers rugged performance for all-weather riding. 4 superbright, high-powered red LEDs offer excellent visibility; light output can reach as high as 44 lumens and can be seen as far away as 2,625 feet (800m). Lens is designed to provide a balance between beam width and distance, optimizing visibility. 5 different lighting modes suit your needs: steady, fast flash, organic flash slow, organic flash fast and eco-flash. Lasts upto 3 hrs. in steady mode, 4 - 5 hrs. in fast flash or organic flash slow modes, 15 hrs. in organic flash fast mode and up to 50 hrs. in eco-flash mode. Recharge the lithium ion polymer battery via integrated USB plug; fold-out USB plug is waterproof and will not be damaged by exposure to the elements. Anodized aluminum face and rugged, flexible silicone body stand up to hard use. Tool-free attachment stretches and secures with metal clip around seat posts or frame tubes with diameters of 22 - 32 mm. The Knog Blinder 4 is IP66 tested and 100% waterproof.
short_description: Bright, waterproof and easy to install, the Knog Blinder 4 rear bike light offers rugged performance for all-weather riding.
